title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 267.9 - City of Yonkers partnership returns
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 267.9 - City of Yonkers partnership returns

State Regulations

Tax Law, § 14(b) of §§ 1340(c), 1342; Codes and Ordinances
of the City of Yonkers, §§ 92-111(b), 92-113
(a) Filing requirements. In general, every partnership doing business in the City of

Yonkers and having any partners who are nonresidents of the City of Yonkers, regardless of the amount of its income, must file a City of Yonkers partnership
return for each taxable year irrespective of the taxable years of the partners. The City of Yonkers partnership return must set forth all items of income, gain, loss and deduction, and must include the complete names, addresses and
identification numbers of all the partners and such other information or
schedules as the State Tax Commission may prescribe by forms and
instructions. (b) Due
date for filing. The due date for filing a City of Yonkers partnership
return is the same as the due date for filing a New York State partnership
return (see section
158.9
[b]
of this Title). (c) City of Yonkers partnership returns not required. Where, pursuant to section
158.9
(c) of this Title, a New York State partnership return is not required to be filed, a City of Yonkers partnership return will not be required to be
filed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
267.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
